cobblemon.species.ayreiancombusken.desc: They blend in seemlessly with the shadows, which enable an easy ambush. When ignored, they will sometimes attack their own trainer.
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.ayreianblaziken.desc: Wild and unpredictable, their legs kick the life out of their opponents. The floating limbs disappear if they stray too far from the main body.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.name: Nosepass
cobblemon.species.ayreiannosepass.desc: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.name: Aron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaron.desc: When Aron evolves, it leaves behind molten pebbles. In ancient times, people would collect Aron's shed rocks to warm themselves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.ayreianlairon.desc: During territorial disputes, Lairon emits high amounts of steam. Close inspection of their magma armor reveals scratches and dents.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.ayreianaggron.desc: The temperature inside Aggron's core can be compared to that of an industrial furnace. When threatened, it blows molten rock out of the pores on its back.
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.ayreianroselia.desc: It will fire rapid strikes from the toxic flowers on its hands if it feels threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.ayreiannumel.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.ayreiancamerupt.desc: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.name: Trapinch
cobblemon.species.ayreiantrapinch.desc: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.ayreianvibrava.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.ayreianflygon.desc: The loss in power during this phase has changed Vibrava's metabolism, now only feeding on plants. They are very skittish and will most likely flee when threatened.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.name: Swablu
cobblemon.species.ayreianswablu.desc: While cute and seemingly docile, it angers really quickly. They nest in areas most often hit by thunderstorms.
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.ayreianaltaria.desc: Only seen during thunderstorms, they brave the dark skies uncontested in both ferocity and boldness.
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.name: Lunatone
cobblemon.species.ayreianlunatone.desc: Different types of music can be heard coming from it, depending on the mood it's in.
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.name: Relicanth
cobblemon.species.ayreianrelicanth.desc: Said to be an incredibly old species gone extinct, a few specimen have begun appearing near the shores of Ayrei. They look lifeless at a glance.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluvdisc.name: Luvdisc
cobblemon.species.ayreianluvdisc.desc: It floats about pretending to be dead, waiting for its prey to approach before attacking.
cobblemon.species.relicroselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.relicroselia.desc: A warrior in training, Roselia hone their skills, becoming fearsome despite their short size. They are known for their excellent offensive and defensive capabilities.
cobblemon.species.relicspinda.name: Spinda
cobblemon.species.relicspinda.desc: By the grace of Ho-Ohs ashes, Spinda walked the wheel of life and attained enlightenment. Strategists and sages alike sought out its guidance.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianexploud.name: Exploud
cobblemon.species.kaskadianexploud.desc: It enjoys blasting Grunge music everywhere it goes. The orange patterns on its body are similar to guitar strings and ripped jeans.
cobblemon.species.gutsycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.gutsycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.windycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.windycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.smoggycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.smoggycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.dustycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.dustycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.sandycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.sandycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.swarmycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.swarmycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.spookycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.spookycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.whirlycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.whirlycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.allergycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.allergycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.zappycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.zappycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.zennycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.zennycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.sorcerycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.sorcerycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.shadycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.shadycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.lovelycastform.name: Castform
cobblemon.species.lovelycastform.desc: Castform are artificial Pokemon created in the Hoenn region. Their biology is easily affected by weather and so they change form to better adapt to the weather present.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantropius.name: Tropius
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantropius.desc: Tropius thrives in Kaskade's ever-changing weather because the ground in which it roots is rich in nutrients. They are quiet pokemon, but when furious, their roots transform into powerful weapons that can swiftly overwhelm enemies.
cobblemon.species.mystictreecko.name: Treecko
cobblemon.species.mysticgrovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.mysticsceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.mysticsceptile.desc: After becoming a master of its dojo, it begins to regain its primal instincts. Its draconic traits cause it to have no equal within the karate world.
cobblemon.species.mystictorchic.name: Torchic
cobblemon.species.mysticcombusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.mysticblaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.mysticmudkip.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mysticmarshtomp.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mysticswampert.name: Mudkip
cobblemon.species.mysticpoochyena.name: Poochyena
cobblemon.species.mysticmightyena.name: Mightyena
cobblemon.species.cefiranmakuhita.name: Makuhita
cobblemon.species.cefiranhariyama.name: Hariyama
cobblemon.species.cefiransableye.name: Sableye
cobblemon.species.cefirannumel.name: Numel
cobblemon.species.cefirancamerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.cefiranvibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.cefiranflygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.cefiransnorunt.name: Snorunt
cobblemon.species.cefiranglalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.qamorancombee.name: Combee
cobblemon.species.varitasianmunchlax.des: They compete viciously for food. If you have something it wants to eat, it will chase you down relentlessly until it gets it.
cobblemon.species.interianarceus.name: Arceus
cobblemon.species.hubiantogekiss.name: Togekiss
cobblemon.species.hubiantogekiss.desc: Togekiss on Easter Island is an incredibly revered Pokémon. It is the protector of the island, and upon growing too old, it will appoint a new successor.
cobblemon.species.hizianmismagius.name: Mismagius
cobblemon.species.hizianmismagius.desc: Its flames don't weaken even against the coldest winds, it is seen as a symbol of hope in the harsh frigid mountains.
cobblemon.species.hizianhonchkrow.name: Honchkrow
cobblemon.species.hizianhonchkrow.desc: When it challenges other Honchkrow to a duel, the winner earns the respect of all the Murkrow, while the loser has to leave the region forever.
cobblemon.species.hiziangliscor.name: Gliscor
cobblemon.species.hiziangliscor.desc: It freezes its food with its icy breath inside cave walls, so other Pokémon are unable to take it. When hungry it uses its sharp claws and fangs to easily break through those fronzen walls.
cobblemon.species.hizianskorupi.name: Skorupi
cobblemon.species.hizianskorupi.desc: Their nests are commonly found in steep cliffsides. Swarms of Skorupis can be seem climbing up mountains as the sun sets.
cobblemon.species.hiziandrapion.name: Drapion
cobblemon.species.hiziandrapion.desc: What it lacks in venom it makes up in strength. Drapion is capable of tossing a rock twice its own size, using nothing but its tail.
cobblemon.species.eghohappiny.name: Happiny
cobblemon.species.eghohappiny.desc: In order to adapt to an environment of egg-stealing predators, Happiny has become hyper-aggressive and territorial. It carries an egg-shaped rock in its pouch.
cobblemon.species.eghomagnezone.name: Magnezone
cobblemon.species.eghomagnezone.desc: This Magnezone is a result of a sudden mutation causing one of the Magneton's bodies to absorb the other two and grow rapidly in power.
cobblemon.species.eghotangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.eghotangrowth.desc: Tangrowth has the ability to absorb and supply electricity through the prongs on the ends of its arms, enabling it to act as a sort of living battery.
cobblemon.species.deltaturtwig.name: Turtwig
cobblemon.species.deltaturtwig.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. Made from sand, the shell on its back hardens as it floats along the ocean's surface. As it dives, the shell softens.
cobblemon.species.deltagrotle.name: Grotle
cobblemon.species.deltagrotle.desc: It lives along the water's surface in oceans. During the day, it dives underwater regularly to refresh the sea life taking shelter on its back.
cobblemon.species.deltatorterra.name: Torterra
cobblemon.species.deltatorterra.desc: As it moves in the ocean continuously, pirates store their loot in its back for safekeeping. It oftentimes participates in treasure hunts for younger Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deltashinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.deltashinx.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. A single scratch from it is toxic enough to faint targets as it flees into the wild.
cobblemon.species.deltaluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.deltaluxio.desc: This Pokémon's poison is potent enough to cause fainting just from standing downwind of it.
cobblemon.species.deltaluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.deltaluxray.desc: One drop of its venom is potent enough to incapacitate 2000 Rattata.
cobblemon.species.deltabudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.deltabudew.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros and EchoTheThird. It hides itself from the sun during the day and stares longingly at the moon at night.
cobblemon.species.deltaroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.deltaroserade.desc: Its fans are capable of whipping up vicious gales. Though shy, it will become aggressive if its dance is interrupted.
cobblemon.species.deltacombee.name: Combee
cobblemon.species.deltacombee.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. The middle body hosts a reactor; it uses this to power up its Fire-type moves.
cobblemon.species.deltavespiquen.name: Vespiquen
cobblemon.species.deltavespiquen.desc: It hovers in the air with electromagnetic force produced from its reactor. If it doesn't consume enough food for fuel, it will be unable to fly.
cobblemon.species.deltaambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.deltaambipom.desc: It plays pranks by frightening people with its detachable head. If its spirit leaves its body, its body is left without arms.
cobblemon.species.deltadrifloon.name: Drifloon
cobblemon.species.deltadrifloon.desc: A Delta Species discovered by yungbro. It is formed by the passionate spirits of people and Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deltadrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.deltadrifblim.desc: Though it is drowsy during the daytime, it flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
cobblemon.species.deltabuneary.name: Buneary
cobblemon.species.deltabuneary.desc: A Delta Species discovered by nico. It uses its techniques to rob the weak, causing its parents to scold it constantly.
cobblemon.species.deltalopunny.name: Lopunny
cobblemon.species.deltalopunny.desc: Having found inner peace, it fights for the future. As a parent, it never seems to be able to take its eyes off of its mischievous children.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltalopunny.name: DeltaLopunny
cobblemon.species.deltamismagius.name: Mismagius
cobblemon.species.deltamismagius.desc: This Pokémon loves making snow-ghosts with humans. It has an unquenchable love for the holidays.
cobblemon.species.deltamunchlax.name: Munchlax
cobblemon.species.deltamunchlax.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Sparrows413. This Pokémon lays in the fields all day after eating, absorbing nutrients from the sun.
cobblemon.species.deltariolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.deltariolu.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. It practices sanitizing and preserving the bodies of the deceased, showing them one final form of respect.
cobblemon.species.deltalucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.deltalucario.desc: The afterlife and rebirth of souls are sacred to this Pokémon. It will fiercely guard any tomb or cemetery that it comes across from graverobbers.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltalucario.name: DeltaLucario
cobblemon.species.deltacroagunk.name: Croagunk
cobblemon.species.deltacroagunk.desc: A Delta Species discovered by pokefan1241. Its cheeks hold large amounts of fire. It generates thick smog to sneak up behind its opponents and attack them.
cobblemon.species.deltatoxicroak.name: Toxicroak
cobblemon.species.deltatoxicroak.desc: Its knuckles generate flames so intense that they can be used as fiery knives. Stabbing with these flames can easily melt holes in steel.
cobblemon.species.deltatangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.deltatangrowth.desc: A vicious Pokémon which spreads its tendrils beneath the ground, ensnaring unsuspecting trespassers. It uses their cries for help to lure more prey.
cobblemon.species.deltaelectivire.name: Electivire
cobblemon.species.deltaelectivire.desc: After midnight they can be seen congregating on rooftops. However, they always make sure to return to their original positions before morning.
cobblemon.species.deltamagmortar.name: Magmortar
cobblemon.species.deltamagmortar.desc: With additional armor, this Pokémon can easily endure pressures at the bottom of the ocean. Its cannons serve as defense from lurking dangerous opponents.
cobblemon.species.deltayanmega.name: Yanmega
cobblemon.species.deltayanmega.desc: Using its wings to generate massive gusts, it blends in with surrounding foliage and tricks prey into seeking shelter beneath its leaves.
cobblemon.species.deltagallade.name: Gallade
cobblemon.species.deltagallade.desc: A master swordfighter, it uses both Electric- and Ice-type attacks to defeat opponents. Over time it numbs its opponents and decreases their reaction speeds.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltagallade.name: DeltaGallade
cobblemon.species.deltafroslass.name: Froslass
cobblemon.species.deltafroslass.desc: This Pokémon has the power to evaporate entire oceans with a single breath.
cobblemon.species.budewx.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.budewx.desc: If you put your ear to its sound organ, you will hear the sound of a soft breathing. When it's fired up, the sound becomes deafening.
cobblemon.species.roseradex.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.roseradex.desc: It waves its stings to modify any sound wave at will. If it interferes with its opponent's heartbeat, it will cause them irreparable harm.
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.name: Spiritomb
cobblemon.species.spiritombx.desc: Some theories assert that this is Spiritomb's real appearence--it's the one we already know who comes from the Xenoverse.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangrowth.name: Tangrowth
cobblemon.species.hoenniantangrowth.desc: This Pokemon will resort to any means necessary to win in a fight. It stands upright on it's vines to appear larger and more menacing.
cobblemon.species.hoennianregigigas.name: Regigigas
cobblemon.species.hoennianregigigas.desc: After eons of being sealed away, all that remains of Regigigas is its skeletal structure. In its prime, this Pokemon was capable of reshaping the world.
cobblemon.species.seviiancarnivine.name: Carnivine
cobblemon.species.seviianmantyke.name: Mantyke
cobblemon.species.mythianriolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.mythianriolu.desc: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
cobblemon.species.mythianlucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.mythianlucario.desc: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.name: Garchomp
cobblemon.species.armirangarchomp.desc: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.name: Hippopotas
cobblemon.species.armiranhippopotas.desc: It enshrouds itself with water to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy being dry.
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.name: Hippowdon
cobblemon.species.armiranhippowdon.desc: It blasts internally stored water from ports on its body to create a towering whirlpool for attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianshinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.ayreianshinx.desc: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxio.desc: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.ayreianluxray.desc: When in danger, the pattern on its forehead shines brightly. Its retractable claws are overcharged with high voltage electricity.
cobblemon.species.ayreianbudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.ayreianbudew.desc: Rarely seen in the wild, these pokemon remain particularly buried to gain nutrients. What looks like a mask is in reality a hardened shell that gives its soft body protection. When panicked it releases a spore that reduces agression, but can be very poisonous.
cobblemon.species.ayreianroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.ayreianroserade.desc: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifloon.name: Drifloon
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifloon.desc: They are very fond of people and the positivity they can express. They are often found parading large festivals and parties.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.ayreiandrifblim.desc: This Pokemon always radiates with bright colors. Lost travelers or adventurers who follow it always find their way home.
cobblemon.species.relicbudew.name: Budew
cobblemon.species.relicbudew.desc: Relic Budew appreciates the traditional aspects of warfare, and despite its young age, enjoys an entertaining duel. It claps on the victor using the buds on its head.
cobblemon.species.relicroserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.relicroserade.desc: Ho-OH's ashes caused rapiers to grow out of Relic Roserade's flower buds. It will only take off its mask to a dying opponent and hides its identity at all other times.
cobblemon.species.relicambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.relicambipom.desc: Ho-Ohs ashes awakened Ambipoms hidden martial spirit. Its karate chops are said to crush a steel cuirass like paper.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbidoof.name: Bidoof
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbidoof.desc: With a more iron rich diet, Bidoof's teeth become much stronger, allowing it to chomp through trees in seconds. It was brought to the region to help with construction back when Kaskade was young.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbibarel.name: Bibarel
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbibarel.desc: Through its antenna like whiskers, Bibarel can pick up on radio waves, making it highly intelligent. Its rumored that spies use Bibarel but it has never been confirmed.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianshinx.name: Shinx
cobblemon.species.kaskadianluxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.kaskadianluxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.kaskadianambipom.name: Ambipom
cobblemon.species.amazealldrifblim.name: Drifblim
cobblemon.species.amazealldrifblim.desc: Driftblim enjoys being of service, frequently foregoing sleep and food to fulfill duties for its trainer. Because of its kind nature, it's an excellent pokémon for package delivery, but they grow enraged if anything gets in the way of performing their mission.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianskuntank.name: Skuntank
cobblemon.species.kaskadianskuntank.desc: Being surrounded by Histameanie swarms, it has adapted to the 'vibes' or nature. Mellowing out its previous dark ways and just enjoying the world around it. However, it does still smell awful.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansnover.name: Snover
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansnover.desc: They gather near footsteps they discover on snowy mountains, having interested about people. They keep a close eye on travelers and drop berries as gifts on the trails.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianabomasnow.des: Originally thought to be a regional evolution of Snover, it is now understood to be the form Abomasnow adopts in warmer climates. It loses its mastery over ice by shedding its snowy coat, but gains access to strong earth-shattering attacks.
cobblemon.species.solrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.swayrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.brawlrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.webrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.junkrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.homerotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.bassrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.twirlrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.mixrotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.mysticriolu.name: Riolu
cobblemon.species.mysticlucario.name: Lucario
cobblemon.species.cefiransnover.name: Snover
cobblemon.species.cefiranabomasnow.name: Abomasnow
cobblemon.species.cefiranfroslass.name: Froslass
cobblemon.species.qamorancubchoo.name: Cubchoo
cobblemon.species.qamoranbeartic.name: Beartic
cobblemon.species.varitasianyamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.varitasianyamask.desc: It's bound to a mirror, possibly as a punishment for extreme vanity when alive. It constantly gazes at itself, sometimes appearing to show discomfort, yet it never looks away. Legends say that the mirror has the power to steal one's soul if looked into.
cobblemon.species.varitasianklink.name: Klink
cobblemon.species.varitasianklink.desc: At the price of one minigear atrophying, it has now developed a somewhat soft, flexible outer membrane. Though it often floats, its seems to enjoy rolling along the ground, as it helps it both move faster and generate energy faster.
cobblemon.species.varitasianklang.name: Klang
cobblemon.species.varitasianklang.desc: Given its increase in weight, Klang can now easily bowl over small obstacles with its large wheel. It can also swing either part of itself around by its joint to cause major damage.
cobblemon.species.varitasiantynamo.name: Tynamo
cobblemon.species.varitasiantynamo.desc: Generations of living in muddy water neutralized its electrical charge. It instead began to focus more on swimming and burrowing through swampy terrain.
cobblemon.species.varitasianeelektrik.de: It's so slippery that it can comfortably swim through muddy ground as if it's liquid. It swallows vast amounts of mud, absorbs any nutrients or plant matter in it and then spits up what's left.
cobblemon.species.varitasianeelektross.d: It lurks in murky swamps, digging complex tunnel systems. It feeds mainly on plant matter and will occasionally hunt down grass type pokemon to latch onto and drain their life force with its powerful gaping mouth.
cobblemon.species.interiangenesect.name: Genesect
cobblemon.species.hizianheatmor.name: Heatmor
cobblemon.species.hizianheatmor.desc: It spills flammable gas and strikes its claws together to ignite fires. Using this strategy, Heatmor lures Termunch out of their underground nests.
cobblemon.species.hiziandruddigon.name: Druddigon
cobblemon.species.hiziandruddigon.desc: The various crystals growing on its body absorb and store heat, allowing it to live in colder climates without freezing.
cobblemon.species.avorianmaractus.name: Maractus
cobblemon.species.avorianmaractus.desc: Once every fall, groups of this Pokémon gather and dance in unison throughout the entire night. Other Ghost-type Pokémon are invited to dance along with them. The bone-chilling rattling in their hollow bodies is enough to paralyze adults with fear.
cobblemon.species.eghotrubbish.name: Trubbish
cobblemon.species.eghotrubbish.desc: As a result of urban clean-up initiatives, many Trubbish were mistakenly thrown into garbage cans. Being too weak to escape, they instead repurpose the cans as armor.
cobblemon.species.eghogarbodor.name: Garbodor
cobblemon.species.eghogarbodor.desc: When Trubbish eat enough to get too big for their can, they will evolve into a Garbodor. They get larger with the more waste they stuff in their dumpster.
cobblemon.species.deltasnivy.name: Snivy
cobblemon.species.deltasnivy.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Aboodie. They usually form small colonies in the midst of raging seas, where they are protected from predators.
cobblemon.species.deltaservine.name: Servine
cobblemon.species.deltaservine.desc: Despite rarely coming up above the water's surface, on rainy days they use the cover of clouds to laze about on rocks and take in the fresh sea air.
cobblemon.species.deltaserperior.name: Serperior
cobblemon.species.deltaserperior.desc: Though they viciously protect their domains from outsiders, they admire and welcome the company of trainers who brave the oceans to meet them.
cobblemon.species.deltapurrloin.name: Purrloin
cobblemon.species.deltapurrloin.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. This Pokémon wanders the city streets while scaring people with its illusions.
cobblemon.species.deltaliepard.name: Liepard
cobblemon.species.deltaliepard.desc: This Pokémon makes use of illusions and trickery to catch its prey.
cobblemon.species.deltavenipede.name: Venipede
cobblemon.species.deltavenipede.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit. It is highly aggressive and will attempt to set its surroundings on fire when agitated.
cobblemon.species.deltawhirlipede.name: Whirlipede
cobblemon.species.deltawhirlipede.desc: Though it prefers to remain still and blend in with its surroundings, when threatened it bursts forward at high speed and then crashes into its opponent explosively.
cobblemon.species.deltascolipede.name: Scolipede
cobblemon.species.deltascolipede.desc: Though it prefers to remain still and blend in with its surroundings, when threatened it bursts forward at high speed and then crashes into its opponent explosively.
cobblemon.species.deltawaterpetilil.name: Petilil
cobblemon.species.deltawaterpetilil.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Steads42. It can be seen from within submarines, frolicking along the deep sea floor.
cobblemon.species.deltawaterlilligant.de: The flame atop its head burns so intensely that not even water can douse it. It has been know to help guide diving humans to safety.
cobblemon.species.deltafairypetilil.name: Petilil
cobblemon.species.deltafairypetilil.desc: A Delta Species discovered by shadowsofme. It gracefully descends upon weary travelers, restoring their morale and energy in the process.
cobblemon.species.deltafairylilligant.de: Capable of producing massive barriers that provide weaker Pokémon with a sanctuary, it observed the Torren Region from afar during its greatest times of crisis.
cobblemon.species.deltadarumaka.name: Darumaka
cobblemon.species.deltadarumaka.desc: A Delta Species discovered by potatoking12. Being quite mischievous, it runs through streets at night while making strange noises.
cobblemon.species.deltadarmanitan.name: Darmanitan
cobblemon.species.deltadarmanitan.desc: When facing weakened foes, it can sometimes possess them by passing through them. It still tries to use doors despite passing straight through them.
cobblemon.species.deltamaractus.name: Maractus
cobblemon.species.deltamaractus.desc: A Delta Species discovered by mushgloom. They move systematically, causing their gears and motors to produce an almost musical sound effect.
cobblemon.species.deltaberrydwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.deltaberrydwebble.desc: A Delta Species discovered by MorallyIncorrect. It makes homes in various berry bushes until they stop producing fruit.
cobblemon.species.deltaberrycrustle.name: Crustle
cobblemon.species.deltaberrycrustle.desc: With its powerful pincers, it tills the earth and plants berries from the hedge on its back, creating future homes for itself and its offspring.
cobblemon.species.deltacakedwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.deltacakedwebble.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit. It entices strangers with its sweet scent, taking offense if they do not immediately attempt to taste its frosting.
cobblemon.species.deltacakecrustle.name: Crustle
cobblemon.species.deltacakecrustle.desc: While it does not mind sharing its pastry with others, it will stab thieves with its fork. Its body is quite cold in order to preserve the freshness of its cake.
cobblemon.species.deltascraggy.name: Scraggy
cobblemon.species.deltascraggy.desc: A Delta Species discovered by DankRabbit. Despite being a Grass-type, it is quite adept at hunting Bug-types for food.
cobblemon.species.deltascrafty.name: Scrafty
cobblemon.species.deltascrafty.desc: The tuft of grass on its head is surprisingly hard; it can be used to break through rocks.
cobblemon.species.deltayamask.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.deltayamask.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Palfi. This Pokémon formed from radioactive waste that was carelessly dumped in landfills.
cobblemon.species.deltacofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus
cobblemon.species.deltacofagrigus.desc: This Pokémon frequents nuclear landfills in order to keep surrounding areas free from radiation. Destroying its exterior would produce an explosion exceeding 720 kilotons.
cobblemon.species.deltasolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.deltasolosis.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Steads42. Its survival is dependent upon its soul remaining bound to its rock.
cobblemon.species.deltaduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.deltaduosion.desc: As its power grows, so do the number of rocks under its control. Each rock appears to have a mind of its own.
cobblemon.species.deltareuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.deltareuniclus.desc: Extraordinarily cunning, it can survive any attack so long as a fragment of itself remains within a rock.
cobblemon.species.deltaemolga.name: Emolga
cobblemon.species.deltaemolga.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird. On cold nights they spit hot embers on their tails and feet to ignite them. The ensuing blaze can be seen for miles.
cobblemon.species.deltakarrablast.name: Karablast
cobblemon.species.deltakarrablast.desc: A Delta Species discovered by bradleyinabox. For unknown reasons, this Pokémon is extremely friendly towards Shelmet.
cobblemon.species.deltaescavalier.name: Escavalier
cobblemon.species.deltaescavalier.desc: It drenches the shell of a Shelmet in its own saliva before wearing it, creating a sugary, white coating. The steel armor is then resistant to Fire-type attacks.
cobblemon.species.deltafoongus.name: Foongus
cobblemon.species.deltafoongus.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. It disguises itself as a harmless umbrella and then frightens people attempting to grab it by licking their hand.
cobblemon.species.deltaamoonguss.name: Amoonguss
cobblemon.species.deltaamoonguss.desc: Though not always malicious in nature, they offer to shield Pokémon from the rain using their arms only to play pranks once the Pokémon's guard has dropped.
cobblemon.species.deltalitwick.name: Litwick
cobblemon.species.deltalitwick.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Aboodie. It shares its flames with others by occupying dark spaces and illuminating its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.deltalampent.name: Lampent
cobblemon.species.deltalampent.desc: It has been known to appear next to children having nightmares, basking them in its warmth and eliminating all negative thoughts and emotions.
cobblemon.species.deltachandelure.name: Chandelure
cobblemon.species.deltachandelure.desc: Its flames will never harm its trainer. On the contrary, being engulfed in its flames purifies both the body and soul while also increasing a person's lifespan.
cobblemon.species.deltaaxew.name: Axew
cobblemon.species.deltaaxew.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. It takes large bites out of docked boats, forcing local fishermen to invest in boats made of extremely strong metal.
cobblemon.species.deltafraxure.name: Fraxure
cobblemon.species.deltafraxure.desc: Growing bolder as it becomes stronger, it prefers to bite boats being used by fishermen. However, sometimes they are careless and are pierced by fish hooks.
cobblemon.species.deltahaxorus.name: Haxorus
cobblemon.species.deltahaxorus.desc: Its dorsal fin fuses with an anchor during evolution. Though it loses its ability to quickly navigate through water, it becomes a very fearsome foe on land.
cobblemon.species.deltagolett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.deltagolett.desc: A Delta Species discovered by RuneBlad3. It battles in arenas every day, honing its skills in the hopes that it will one day become a champion.
cobblemon.species.deltagolurk.name: Golurk
cobblemon.species.deltagolurk.desc: It fights barehanded even against armed foes, as no weapon is capable of piercing its armor. No one knows what its face looks like without wearing its helmet.
cobblemon.species.deltapawniard.name: Pawniard
cobblemon.species.deltapawniard.desc: A Delta Species discovered by EchoTheThird and Zero_Breaker. It flies through the air and strikes at its prey.
cobblemon.species.deltabisharp.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.deltabisharp.desc: It commands a large group of Pawniard. A single swing of its arm is enough to summon a hurricane.
cobblemon.species.mega_deltabisharp.name: DeltaBisharp
cobblemon.species.deltaheatmor.name: Heatmor
cobblemon.species.deltaheatmor.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Radryl and EchoTheThird. The mechanisms inside of its body allow it to churn acids at high velocity and fire them from its arms.
cobblemon.species.deltadeino.name: Deino
cobblemon.species.deltadeino.desc: A Delta Species discovered by NoNameDummy. Being blind, they use their tongues to sense objects around them through different scents. They bite anything that moves.
cobblemon.species.deltazweilous.name: Zweilous
cobblemon.species.deltazweilous.desc: As its heads are quite competitive, it faces problems if both heads try to swallow its prey whole. It can spit venom over the length of an Olympic swimming pool.
cobblemon.species.deltahydreigon.name: Hydreigon
cobblemon.species.deltahydreigon.desc: It uses its smaller heads to scout out an area before dominating anything it considers prey. Though females of this species are shy, males should be avoided at all costs.
cobblemon.species.deltalarvesta.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.deltalarvesta.desc: A Delta Species discovered by 1ofthe4rocketbros. It prefers to remain in solitude, away from all forms of life. When its anger peaks, it is able to distort dimensions.
cobblemon.species.deltavolcarona.name: Volcarona
cobblemon.species.deltavolcarona.desc: Contact with humans causes it to release lethal toxins into the air for miles. Experiments suggest that it can warp space and summon black holes.
cobblemon.species.deltameloetta.name: Meloetta
cobblemon.species.deltameloetta.desc: A Delta Species discovered by mushgloom. It became a mime after finding itself without a voice, but it is suspected that finding its voice would unlock its powers.
cobblemon.species.yamaskx.name: Yamask
cobblemon.species.yamaskx.desc: Its calcareous shell resembles an ancient water jar. It is unknown if men's artifacts were inspired by this Pokémon or vice versa.
cobblemon.species.cofagrigusx.name: Cofagrigus
cobblemon.species.cofagrigusx.desc: Its limbs are made of pure cristalline water. Some people believe that a single sip of that water will give you everlasting life.
cobblemon.species.joltikx.name: Joltik
cobblemon.species.joltikx.desc: They sneak up falling from the sky in large groups, so they can overcome their small size. Then they bring the prey to Galvantula.
cobblemon.species.galvantulax.name: Galvantula
cobblemon.species.galvantulax.desc: It freezes the air around its nest. Then it traps prey in a thick ice web, slowly leading them to hypothermia.
cobblemon.species.bisharpx.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.bisharpx.desc: The Bisharp owned by Dimension Sergeant S. The consciences of both A & B's Bisharp coexist in this Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.hoennianmaractus.name: Maractus
cobblemon.species.hoennianmaractus.desc: Maractus were forced out of the desert due to competition with rival Cacturne. It's ability to survive nonetheless is a testament to its hardiness.
cobblemon.species.hoenniansolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.hoenniansolosis.desc: Solosis in Hoenn have adapted on a cellular level to resemble common berries. They avoid unwanted attention by hiding within fruit trees.
cobblemon.species.hoennianduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.hoennianduosion.desc: It constantly devours berries by absorbing them through it's jelly-like membrane. Their brilliant gold color glows brightly after they finish a meal.
cobblemon.species.hoennianreuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.hoennianreuniclus.desc: It constantly devours berries by absorbing them through it's jelly-like membrane. Their brilliant gold color glows brightly after they finish a meal.
cobblemon.species.hoennianemolga.name: Emolga
cobblemon.species.hoennianemolga.desc: Emolga swoop down from the sky in an effort to frighten townsfolk. Due to their adorable appearance, however, they are rarely successful.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantynamo.name: Tynamo
cobblemon.species.hoenniantynamo.desc: It releases a foul odor to ward off any potential predators. They travel in large clusters, resulting in unbearable smells as they move from place to place.
cobblemon.species.hoennianeelektrik.name: Eelektrik
cobblemon.species.hoennianeelektrik.desc: Through frequent shedding of it's skin, this Pokemon grows in size at an incredible rate. It devours sand and leaves behind rare minerals as waste
cobblemon.species.hoennianeelektross.des: An Eelektross is scarcely seen above ground. It's monstrous jaws can crush even the hardest materials beneath the surface of the earth.
cobblemon.species.hoennianpawniard.name: Pawniard
cobblemon.species.hoennianpawniard.desc: Though clumsy and prone to error, a Pawniard will never give up on it's journey to grow stronger. It constantly seeks out new sparring partners.
cobblemon.species.hoennianbisharp.name: Bisharp
cobblemon.species.hoennianbisharp.desc: Chivalrous to a fault, these Pokemon will defend their Trainers with unwavering loyalty. In the wild, they are often seen with a troupe of Pawniard in tow.
cobblemon.species.seviianblitzle.name: Blitzle
cobblemon.species.seviianzebstrika.name: Zebstrika
cobblemon.species.mythianzorua.name: Zorua
cobblemon.species.mythianzorua.desc: Due to the overwhelming heat of the Mythan Desert, Zorua tried to seek shelter within the Catacombs of the Mythan Desert, eventually changing form.
cobblemon.species.mythianzoroark.name: Zoroark
cobblemon.species.mythianzoroark.desc: Due to the overwhelming heat of the Mythan Desert, Zorua tried to seek shelter within the Catacombs of the Mythan Desert, eventually changing form.
cobblemon.species.mythianlarvesta.name: Larvesta
cobblemon.species.mythianlarvesta.desc: The moonlight is attracted by Larvesta and it stores it all inside its chest, waiting to evolve.
cobblemon.species.mythianvolcarona.name: Volcarona
cobblemon.species.mythianvolcarona.desc: Volcarona from Mythan have adapted to the rays ammitted from the moon at night, causing an outbreak of magical transformation once evolving.
cobblemon.species.alteranzorua.name: Zorua
cobblemon.species.alteranzorua.desc: An old fable describes a ZORUA cloaked in so many illusions that it turned into one itself. This form is said to be its descendant.
cobblemon.species.armiranroggenrola.name: Roggenrola
cobblemon.species.armiranroggenrola.desc: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
cobblemon.species.armiranboldore.name: Boldore
cobblemon.species.armiranboldore.desc: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
cobblemon.species.armirangigalith.name: Gigalith
cobblemon.species.armirangigalith.desc: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
cobblemon.species.ayreiandwebble.name: Dwebble
cobblemon.species.ayreiandwebble.desc: The plant on top of its back secretes a sticky substance similar to glue, which is why sometimes Dwebble will have items attached to it, like Heart Scales.
cobblemon.species.ayreianarchen.name: Archen
cobblemon.species.ayreianarchen.desc: While its weight prevents it from flying, it can jump up to 30 feet in the air.
cobblemon.species.ayreianarcheops.name: Archeops
cobblemon.species.ayreianarcheops.desc: Scientists believe this was the true form of Archeops, millions of years ago. Its legs are powerful enough to overturn a truck, but it is still unable to fly.
cobblemon.species.ayreianminccino.name: Minccino
cobblemon.species.ayreianminccino.desc: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancinccino.name: Cinccino
cobblemon.species.ayreiancinccino.desc: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won't tolerate even a speck of the stuff.
cobblemon.species.ayreianducklett.name: Ducklett
cobblemon.species.ayreianducklett.desc: They're always seen either dancing or sleeping if not soaring gracefully through the air.
cobblemon.species.ayreianswanna.name: Swanna
cobblemon.species.ayreianswanna.desc: Swanna start to dance at dawn. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillite.name: Vanillite
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillite.desc: Unable to survive in cold areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air to cause sandstorms. It burrows into the sand to sleep.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillish.name: Vanillish
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanillish.desc: Unable to survive in cold areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air to cause sandstorms. It burrows into the sand to sleep.
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanniluxe.name: Vanniluxe
cobblemon.species.ayreianvanniluxe.desc: Its outer shell is as hot as the inside of an active volcano. It obliviously burns everything in its vicinity to a crisp, be it friend or foe.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangurdurr.name: Gurdurr
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.kaskadiansolosis.desc: Kaskadian Solosis are powerful telepaths who can interact with other pokemon and even humans using only their minds. Their bodies are floating in a water-filled bubble that, unlike their Unovan counterparts, cannot be punctured.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.kaskadianduosion.desc: Their brains flop around in a thick watery liquid, shielded by one of their brains' psychic power. They're constantly conversing amongst themselves, which distracts them from whatever task they're working on.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiangolett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.mysticsolosis.name: Solosis
cobblemon.species.mysticduosion.name: Duosion
cobblemon.species.mysticreuniclus.name: Reuniclus
cobblemon.species.cefiranpetilil.name: Petilil
cobblemon.species.cefiranlilligant.name: Lilligant
cobblemon.species.cefirangothitelle.name: Gothitelle
cobblemon.species.cefirangolett.name: Golett
cobblemon.species.cefirangolurk.name: Golurk
cobblemon.species.varitasianflabebe.name: Flabébé
cobblemon.species.varitasianflabebe.desc: They collect spores and keep them on their head for various uses. They will sit quietly on mushrooms if observed but are likely to do something mischeivious if you look away.
cobblemon.species.varitasianfloette.name: Floette
cobblemon.species.varitasianfloette.desc: It picks its favorite mushroom and uses it to shield itself from sunlight. If enraged, it swings the mushroom around madly spreading spores everywhere.
cobblemon.species.varitasianphantump.des: The stumps of Varitan Phantump are particularly overrun with fungus, giving them power over its growth. Though sometimes they exhibit odd behavior, believed to be an effect of the fungus.
cobblemon.species.varitasiantrevenant.de: It now appears to be fully under the control of the fungus on its body, often shambling around eerily as if being puppeted. Its only concern seems to be maintaing the fungus and spreading its spores at much as possible.
cobblemon.species.hizianlitleo.name: Litleo
cobblemon.species.hizianlitleo.desc: They usually can be seen playing and pouncing on thin air, its unknown if they are playing with the wind or unseen spirits.
cobblemon.species.hizianpyroar.name: Pyroar
cobblemon.species.hizianpyroar.desc: They hunt their prey accompained by strong wind currents, their swift movement alongside the wind allows it to become partially invisible.
cobblemon.species.deltafroakie.name: Froakie
cobblemon.species.deltafroakie.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Ubodot. The leaves around its neck help keep its neck warm while jumping through the trees at high speed.
cobblemon.species.deltafrogadier.name: Frogadier
cobblemon.species.deltafrogadier.desc: It can hurl the leaves produced around its neck at alarming speed, even slicing through tree trunks.
cobblemon.species.deltagreninja.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.deltagreninja.desc: It hides within the deepest of foliage, only appearing to intimidate intruders. It blocks its enemies easily using its armor before incinerating them.
cobblemon.species.deltaamaura.name: Amaura
cobblemon.species.deltaamaura.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Steads42. This Pokémon floats around unnoticed in the ocean until it comes into contact with humans and greets them.
cobblemon.species.deltaaurorus.name: Aurorus
cobblemon.species.deltaaurorus.desc: This Pokémon willingly offers rides to other Pokémon and ferries them to other islands. It can float in the ocean endlessly so long as the sun is shining.
cobblemon.species.deltagoomy.name: Goomy
cobblemon.species.deltagoomy.desc: A Delta Species discovered by AChosen_Username. Its body is mainly composed of mud and is extremely squishy when touched.
cobblemon.species.deltasliggoo.name: Sliggoo
cobblemon.species.deltasliggoo.desc: It requires water in order to maintain its shape and health. Dryness is a sign of a sick Sliggoo.
cobblemon.species.deltagoodra.name: Goodra
cobblemon.species.deltagoodra.desc: It expels and absorbs water continually on a daily basis. The occasional pebble that makes its way into its body can be expelled by belching.
cobblemon.species.deltaphantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.deltaphantump.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. It protects all woodland Pokémon as a spirit guardian of the forest.
cobblemon.species.deltatrevenant.name: Trevenant
cobblemon.species.deltatrevenant.desc: It guards the forest and would lay down its life to protect weaker Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.deltabergmite.name: Bergmite
cobblemon.species.deltabergmite.desc: A Delta Species discovered by Zero_Breaker. Nearly impervious to physical attacks, its rate of regeneration exceeds the damage that it does receive.
cobblemon.species.deltaavalugg.name: Avalugg
cobblemon.species.deltaavalugg.desc: The rocks covering its body are as hard as steel. Its rampage is ferocious enough to destroy an entire mountain range.
cobblemon.species.deltanoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.deltanoibat.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. It uses blades of grass to create earsplittingly high frequencies of sound which stun its prey.
cobblemon.species.deltanoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.deltanoivern.desc: A Delta Species discovered by LunarDusk. It uses camouflage to stalk its enemies, but its heavy metal prevents it from flying.
cobblemon.species.deltahoopa.name: Hoopa
cobblemon.species.deltahoopa.desc: A Delta Species discovered by TerraTerraCotta. The clouds produced around its torso allow it to remain in the air even while it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.deltahoopaunleashed.de: A Delta Species discovered by TerraTerraCotta. The clouds produced around its torso allow it to remain in the air even while it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.greninjax.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.greninjax.desc: It moves under cover of darkness. It throws knives of hell fire at its opponents, piercing their flesh and leaving them with atrocious burns.
cobblemon.species.aegislashx.name: Aegislash
cobblemon.species.aegislashx.desc: It's mentioned in legends as the companion of the First King. It uses its momentum to move at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.swirlixx.name: Swirlix
cobblemon.species.swirlixx.desc: The appealing sweet fragrance it releases vaguely resembles that of Leppa Berries. Behind its delicious appearence lies an acid filling.
cobblemon.species.slurpuffx.name: Slurpuff
cobblemon.species.slurpuffx.desc: Anyone who digests its sweets will feel a strong sense of nausea. The more you eat them, the bigger Slurpuff gets.
cobblemon.species.hoenniangoomy.name: Goomy
cobblemon.species.hoenniangoomy.desc: It uses it's horns to check out it's surroundings. They're very sensitive, so if you grab them, it will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.
cobblemon.species.seviianclauncher.name: Clauncher
cobblemon.species.seviianclawitzer.name: Clawitzer
cobblemon.species.seviiannoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.seviiannoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.mythiannoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.mythiannoivern.desc: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
cobblemon.species.armiranfroakie.name: Froakie
cobblemon.species.armiranfroakie.desc: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate smoke. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.armiranfrogadier.name: Frogadier
cobblemon.species.armiranfrogadier.desc: It can disappear within moments. Now you see it, now you don't.
cobblemon.species.armirangreninja.name: Greninja
cobblemon.species.armirangreninja.desc: It appears and vanishes with a ninjas grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfletchling.name: Fletchling
cobblemon.species.ayreianfletchling.desc: When this Pokémon gets excited, its body temperature lowers harshly. If you touch a Fletchling with bare hands, you might catch a cold.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfletchinder.des: Fletchinder launches embers into the den of its prey. When the prey comes leaping out, Fletchinder's sharp talons finish it off.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpancham.name: Pancham
cobblemon.species.ayreianpancham.desc: Wanting to make sure it's taken seriously, Pancham's always giving others a glare. But if it's not focusing, it ends up smiling.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpangoro.name: Pangoro
cobblemon.species.ayreianpangoro.desc: Angrier than a raging inferno, it pummels opponents with a fiery might. The fire emanating from its body is hot enough to melt the metal of a jet plane.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancarbink.name: Carbink
cobblemon.species.ayreiancarbink.desc: The bands of iron spinning around it's core protect it from almost every kind of attack.
cobblemon.species.ayreianklefki.name: Klefki
cobblemon.species.ayreianklefki.desc: Radiating with electricity, it was commonly used to access electronically locked facilities.
cobblemon.species.ayreianpumpkaboo.name: Pumpkaboo
cobblemon.species.ayreianpumpkaboo.desc: When taking spirits to the afterlife, small Pumpkaboo prefer the spirits of children to those of adults.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangourgeist.name: Gourgeist
cobblemon.species.ayreiangourgeist.desc: Soft cries emanate from its body in the dead of night. The sounds are said to be the wails of spirits who are resting in the afterlife.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoibat.name: Noibat
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoibat.desc: It likes to think it has wings that allow it to fly when in reality it just floats around.
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoivern.name: Noivern
cobblemon.species.ayreiannoivern.desc: While it may look intimidating, it has a gentle and caring disposition. That said, it will shoot down anyone threatening its protégé with beams of light.
cobblemon.species.relicskiddo.name: Skiddo
cobblemon.species.relicskiddo.desc: Locals in the surrounding area noticed that Relic Skiddo had reemerged, as many of the trees in the forest had been rammed down. This means a Skiddo is about to evolve, and wants to hone its skills.
cobblemon.species.relicgogoat.name: Gogoat
cobblemon.species.relicgogoat.desc: Relic Gogoats DNA was altered, and rocky outcrops grew all over its body. Old records tell of a mounted Relic Gogoat ending a month-long siege in a matter of seconds, by turning the castle gates to splinters with a full-speed horn bash. No momentum was lost.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbunnelby.name: Bunnelby
cobblemon.species.kaskadianphantump.name: Phantump
cobblemon.species.kaskadianphantump.desc: Unlike its Kalosian counter parts, Kaskadian Phantump's leaves when brewed, can create a very harmful poison. Scientists have used it to create modern day antidotes.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiantrevenant.des: Kaskadian Trevenant have a tough time following orders, the toxins that are in its body affect its brain, making it difficult to tell friends apart from foes. It takes an experienced trainer to control one.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiandiancie.name: Diancie
cobblemon.species.kaskadiandiancie.desc: A Delta Species discovered by TerraTerraCotta. The clouds produced around its torso allow it to remain in the air even while it is asleep.
cobblemon.species.cefiranklefki.name: Klefki
cobblemon.species.cefiranklefki.desc: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
cobblemon.species.qamoransandygast.name: Psyduck
cobblemon.species.varitasianbounsweet.de: Heavy pollution of its habitat caused it to spoil and succumb to parasites, yet it still lives on somehow. It's unknown whether it controls the worm in its head or vice versa.
cobblemon.species.varitasiansteenee.name: Steenee
cobblemon.species.varitasiansteenee.desc: It can use the multiple worms from its head to attack foes. It has an uptight and cruel temperment so it does this often. Most stay away from it anyways because it doesn't smell particularly good.
cobblemon.species.mareaniex.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.mareaniex.desc: When frightened, it shoots fire and sparks from the top of its head. It appears to be pretty friendly with others of the same specie.
cobblemon.species.toxapexx.name: Toxapex
cobblemon.species.toxapexx.desc: The special toxin it secretes, when heated, shines brightly. It lures preys and traps tem, using its body as a cage.
cobblemon.species.pyukumukux.name: Pyukumuku
cobblemon.species.pyukumukux.desc: It is way bigger than the actual Pyukumuku. Expelling its internal organs, it propels itself to strike its opponent.
cobblemon.species.tapukokox.name: Tapu Koko
cobblemon.species.tapukokox.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Peyote.
cobblemon.species.tapulelex.name: Tapu Lele
cobblemon.species.tapulelex.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Niva.
cobblemon.species.tapubulux.name: Tapu Bulu
cobblemon.species.tapubulux.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Abraham.
cobblemon.species.tapufinix.name: Tapu Fini
cobblemon.species.tapufinix.desc: One of the four beast from Xenoverse, Dragalisk's elite soldiers. It is held by the Cardinal Chua.
cobblemon.species.hoennianmareanie.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.hoennianmareanie.desc: It protects its soft, viscous body with a thick layer of sturdy rock and debris. Prolonged exposure to dry air causes its skin to harden into brittle spines.
cobblemon.species.hoenniantoxapex.name: Mareanie
cobblemon.species.hoenniantoxapex.desc: It disguises itself as a simple rock to catch unsuspecting prey off guard. Toxapex then rams it's entire body into it's victim, paralyzing it with it's toxic spines.
cobblemon.species.seviianwishiwashi.name: Wishiwashi
cobblemon.species.seviiandhelmise.name: Dhelmise
cobblemon.species.deepwishiwashi.name: Wishiwashi
cobblemon.species.deepwishiwashi.desc: A variant Wishiwashi that dwells in dark caves and deep oceans. It uses the lights from its scales to communicate with others in its school.
cobblemon.species.ayreianyungoos.name: Yungoos
cobblemon.species.ayreianyungoos.desc: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It's a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangumshoos.name: Gumshoos
cobblemon.species.ayreiangumshoos.desc: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It's a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.
cobblemon.species.kaskadianbruxish.name: Bruxish
cobblemon.species.mysticstufful.name: Stufful
cobblemon.species.mysticbewear.name: Stufful
cobblemon.species.norheimanfalinks.name: Falinks
cobblemon.species.varitasianmilcery.name: Milcery
cobblemon.species.varitasianmilcery.desc: Living in areas with humid, salty air caused its body to curdle. This also effected its demeanor as it now acts much more mischieviously. It likes to create puddles from its own gooey body for others to slip and fall into.
cobblemon.species.varitasianalcremie.des: Milcery adorning itself with various savory dish toppings mysteriously causes evolution. Its body is now made of extremely strong-smelling cheese. The cheese's flavor can vary wildly and while most find it sickening overall, a few with an acquired taste consider it a delicacy.
cobblemon.species.hiziansilicobra.name: Silicobra
cobblemon.species.hiziansilicobra.desc: The volley of flames it spits can cover a impressive distance. Their overconfidence can lead them to take on much stronger Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.hiziansandaconda.name: Sandaconda
cobblemon.species.hiziansandaconda.desc: It swallows large amounts of molten magma. It then shoots out massive fireballs at its enemies through its mouth and nostrils.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandreepy.name: Dreepy
cobblemon.species.hoenniandreepy.desc: Dreepy are notorious pranksters. They often dart around in packs, looking for humans or Pokemon to play tricks on. It's den is littered with stolen valuables.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandrakloak.name: Drakloak
cobblemon.species.hoenniandrakloak.desc: Nurturing to a fault, this Pokemon will fervently watch over young Dreepy to keep them out of trouble. It becomes anxious if it has no Dreepy to care for.
cobblemon.species.hoenniandragapult.name: Dragapult
cobblemon.species.hoenniandragapult.desc: Explorers of old would often mistake the Dreepy it carries as additional heads. To this day, this Pokemon is still known as the 'Volcanic Hydra'
cobblemon.species.seviiansizzlipede.name: Sizzlipede
cobblemon.species.mythiankleavor.name: Kleavor
cobblemon.species.mythiankleavor.desc: The minerals native to Mythan cause a weird outbreak that causes Scyther to react to the pure touch or aroma of the minerals.
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrookey.name: Grookey
cobblemon.species.ayreiangrookey.desc: It attacks with rapid jolts of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more charged.
cobblemon.species.ayreianthwacky.name: Thwacky
cobblemon.species.ayreianthwacky.desc: When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.
cobblemon.species.ayreianrillaboom.name: Rillaboom
cobblemon.species.ayreianrillaboom.desc: Its ferocious drumming summons violent thunderstorms. It uses wind currents to direct its electric attacks.
cobblemon.species.ayreiansizzlipede.name: Sizzlipede
cobblemon.species.ayreiansizzlipede.desc: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they're well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.
cobblemon.species.ayreiancentiskorch.des: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.
cobblemon.species.kaskadiandubwool.name: Dubwool
cobblemon.species.qamoranrabsca.name: Rabsca
cobblemon.species.qamoranrabsca.desc: Recover Normal Memento Dark Weather Ball Normal Cosmic Power Psychic
cobblemon.species.seviiannymble.name: Nymble
cobblemon.species.seviianlokix.name: Lokix
cobblemon.species.ayreiansprigatito.name: Sprigatito
cobblemon.species.ayreiansprigatito.desc: When it knows it cannot win, it will messily summon a cloud of poisonous gas and attempt a quick getaway.
cobblemon.species.ayreianfloragato.name: Floragato
cobblemon.species.ayreianfloragato.desc: Floragato deftly wields the poisonous flower buds under its hoodie, throwing them at opponents like grenades.
cobblemon.species.ayreianmeowscarada.des: While it may look innocent, it has a dangerous personality. It tricks other Pokemon into accepting its bouquet, which then erupts into a shower of venomous spikes.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxly.name: Quaxly
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxly.desc: They aim for a clean mind state, but they are still inexperienced, and will anger quickly.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxwell.name: Quaxwell
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaxwell.desc: They nest behind waterfalls, meditating for up to 10 hours a day. That said, the slightest mischief can send them into a frenzy.
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaquaval.name: Quaquaval
cobblemon.species.ayreianquaquaval.desc: After reaching a crystal clear state of mind, this Pokemon can execute even the most head-spinning dance moves flawlessly.
cobblemon.species.foliat.name: Foliat
cobblemon.species.foliat.desc: Although Foliat is unable to fly, it still has an extremely high metabolism. It's often found feeding on sugar-rich nectar and sap found in plants.
cobblemon.species.florabri.name: Florabri
cobblemon.species.florabri.desc: This energetic Pokémon zips around at speeds that make it nearly invisible to the naked eye. It is playful and competitive by nature.
cobblemon.species.floressum.name: Floressum
cobblemon.species.floressum.desc: Floressum can synthesize energy with its symbiotic flower. By rapidly flapping its wings, it can create gusts of wind comparable to a tropical storm.
cobblemon.species.kidling.name: Kidling
cobblemon.species.kidling.desc: Kidling headbutts humans and Pokémon as a sign of affection. When its head makes contact, even gently, the flame on its tail flares up briefly.
cobblemon.species.pyroat.name: Pyroat
cobblemon.species.pyroat.desc: Pyroats flaming hide can be seen streaking across mountainsides at night. When it collides with other Pyroat, the light and noise can be mistaken for an explosion.
cobblemon.species.flairees.name: Flairees
cobblemon.species.flairees.desc: The fire on Flairees' body propels it with enough force to break steel. It forms its territory by smashing apart and leveling mountaintops.
cobblemon.species.aguade.name: Aguade
cobblemon.species.aguade.desc: Aguade's face and hands are armored with rock-hard salt. It uses its fists like hammers to break open nuts and its head to block incoming attacks.
cobblemon.species.iguadium.name: Iguadium
cobblemon.species.iguadium.desc: The thick layer of salt on Iguadiums head and hands protects it in combat. It trains by throwing punches underwater for more resistance to build more muscle.
cobblemon.species.aguanaut.name: Aguanaut
cobblemon.species.aguanaut.desc: Aguanaut devastates its foes with savage blows from its fists and tail, as well as crushing grapples. Its body is armored with dense, impenetrable layers of salt.
cobblemon.species.harpee.name: Harpee
cobblemon.species.harpee.desc: Harpee's perseverance is unmatched. It purposely builds its nest in places with harsh weather and tough opponents, challenging itself to become stronger.
cobblemon.species.aquilor.name: Aquilor
cobblemon.species.aquilor.desc: Aquilor lives in treetops and watches its prey before swooping on it. Its sharp eyes can spot the faintest of movements, even through dense foliage.
cobblemon.species.warquila.name: Warquila
cobblemon.species.warquila.desc: Warquila is a fierce predator that uses its speed and maneuverability to outwit prey. Its powerful talons can tear through even the toughest hides.
cobblemon.species.capig.name: Capig
cobblemon.species.capig.desc: The pattern on Capig's fur is popularly mimicked by the woven hats of locals. It will sometimes sit on its trainer's head to keep them warm.
cobblemon.species.capabara.name: Capabara
cobblemon.species.capabara.desc: The thick fur on its arms and head keeps it warm as it tunnels through cold snow. Capabara are often found in groups, huddling together for warmth.
cobblemon.species.cubzero.name: Cubzero
cobblemon.species.cubzero.desc: The saliva in Cubzeros mouth freezes at an early age, forming sharp, icy fangs that will never melt. If shattered, new ones will freeze in mere hours.
cobblemon.species.avalynx.name: Avalynx
cobblemon.species.avalynx.desc: Avalynx excels at stalking its prey in heavy snowstorms. It can move through deep snow and ice effortlessly without making a sound.
cobblemon.species.fawning.name: Fawning
cobblemon.species.fawning.desc: When first born, Fawning is too weak to defend itself from predators, so it tends to stay near thorny bushes for protection until it joins the herd.
cobblemon.species.llamarsh.name: Llamarsh
cobblemon.species.llamarsh.desc: The wool around Llamarsh's neck keeps it warm, even in sub-zero temperatures. People in cold climates have used it as clothing for generations.
cobblemon.species.buckston.name: Buckston
cobblemon.species.buckston.desc: Proud of their power, Buckston constantly battle to test their strength. It is rumored that their migration herds can be seen from space.
cobblemon.species.pengliff.name: Pengliff
cobblemon.species.pengliff.desc: Pengliff's rock-hard head is solid enough to protect it from damage. Some Pengliff have been seen diving from ledges to crack open boulders for sport.
cobblemon.species.penglacier.name: Penglacier
cobblemon.species.penglacier.desc: Penglacier are adept tunnelers and make their nests by digging caves out of the mountain side. Some snowy mountains have vast cave networks as a result.
cobblemon.species.bluffin.name: Bluffin
cobblemon.species.bluffin.desc: Bluffin's wings aren't powerful enough for flight, so it wanders the snowy peaks on foot. Its long tail drags on the ground and frays at the end.
cobblemon.species.burrmudail.name: Burrmudail
cobblemon.species.burrmudail.desc: Burrmudail's beautiful, crystalline feathers are highly sought after by collectors. If a Burrmudail bestows one to you, it is a sign of good luck.
cobblemon.species.koblin.name: Koblin
cobblemon.species.koblin.desc: Koblin spends its entire life in tunnels deep underground. Because of this, it was long believed to be just a myth told by miners.
cobblemon.species.koberus.name: Koberus
cobblemon.species.koberus.desc: Often the cause of brush fires, Koberus will light its surroundings on fire, creating a thick cloud of smoke in order to disorient its opponents.
cobblemon.species.kobalt.name: Kobalt
cobblemon.species.kobalt.desc: By choosing to stay in the caves, Kobalt has lost its eyesight. This has enhanced its other senses, which it uses to excavate complex tunnel systems.
cobblemon.species.pebblosa.name: Pebblosa
cobblemon.species.pebblosa.desc: It loves to collect rocks from different mountains and caves by carrying them in its mouth. When threatened, Pebblosa will spit them at other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.terratetra.name: Terratetra
cobblemon.species.terratetra.desc: Terratetra use their claws to harvest rocks from deep-within the earth. They use these rocks to make walls and to hurl them at potential threats.
cobblemon.species.gigaard.name: Gigaard
cobblemon.species.gigaard.desc: It uses its claws to carve slabs of granite and crystals from cliff faces to wear as armor. No two Gigaard have the same armor plating.
cobblemon.species.cowatti.name: Cowatti
cobblemon.species.cowatti.desc: Cowatti uses its tail to detect signals of varying frequencies. It can hone in on these signals to locate food, water, and even shelter.
cobblemon.species.snome.name: Snome
cobblemon.species.snome.desc: Snome is very shy and often hides under the snow. When it hides on slopes, it may accidentally roll downhill, picking up more and more snow on the way down.
cobblemon.species.snogre.name: Snogre
cobblemon.species.snogre.desc: Snogre is incredibly reclusive, living in remote valleys and cliff-sides. Villages pass down stories of them appearing to save travelers lost in blizzards.
cobblemon.species.taomarin.name: Taomarin
cobblemon.species.taomarin.desc: Taomarin constantly stands and moves with perfect balance, even in strong winds or uneven ground. Nothing seems to distract it from deep meditation.
cobblemon.species.orangutao.name: Orangutao
cobblemon.species.orangutao.desc: Orangutao are often found solemnly meditating in the wilderness. It is thought that they seek to obtain inner and outer balance in all things.
cobblemon.species.larvabidae.name: Larvabidae
cobblemon.species.larvabidae.desc: Larvabidae follows orders given to it by fully evolved members of the swarm. Its evolution is determined by which role it is most successful in.
cobblemon.species.caranox.name: Caranox
cobblemon.species.caranox.desc: Caranox defends its home aggressively, attacking anything it sees as a threat. It often assaults bigger Pokémon and sprays them with burning acids.
cobblemon.species.carajoule.name: Carajoule
cobblemon.species.carajoule.desc: Carajoule tend to serve as sentries for the hive. It can use its tail to flash signals or warnings and to attack foes with powerful jolts of electricity.
cobblemon.species.caracrust.name: Caracrust
cobblemon.species.caracrust.desc: Because of its heavy carapace, it is a very slow mover. It uses its tough and sturdy defensive capabilities to protect fragile Larvabidae from harm.
cobblemon.species.musburry.name: Musburry
cobblemon.species.musburry.desc: Because this Pokémon grows delicious berries, it is often preyed upon by Berratel. Some Musburry try to exist with Berratel symbiotically.
cobblemon.species.musbushel.name: Musbushel
cobblemon.species.musbushel.desc: Musbushel does not give up the berries it grows easily. When it does, however, it is not only a sign of trust, but also one of friendship and staunch loyalty.
cobblemon.species.berratel.name: Berratel
cobblemon.species.berratel.desc: Berratel eats so many berries that its fur is permanently stained. It waits for other Pokémon to gather berries, and then mugs them for an easy meal.
cobblemon.species.growmeo.name: Growmeo
cobblemon.species.growmeo.desc: Growmeo scurry through flowerbeds in search of a Tuliep. However, they are painfully shy and rarely work up the courage to actually approach one.
cobblemon.species.montegrew.name: Montegrew
cobblemon.species.montegrew.desc: When Montegrew falls out of love, it turns bitter and spiteful. It will begin shunning the Capulilly it once loved, whom it now sees as vain and pompous.
cobblemon.species.tuliep.name: Tuliep
cobblemon.species.tuliep.desc: Tuliep loves nothing more than the attention of a Growmeo. If a Tuliep is seen blushing, it invariably means one is nearby.
cobblemon.species.capulilly.name: Capulilly
cobblemon.species.capulilly.desc: When a Capulilly ceases loving its partner, it becomes haughty and cruel. It treats its former love Montegrew with disrespect, believing it to be callous and unfeeling.
cobblemon.species.dreamdery.name: Dreamdery
cobblemon.species.dreamdery.desc: Despite its adorable looks, Dreamdery is a voracious predator. It devours the dreams of people, leaving its victims disoriented and fatigued.
cobblemon.species.macabra.name: Macabra
cobblemon.species.macabra.desc: Macabra hunts Dreamdery for their wool. It has developed an immunity to their attacks, making it popular among people dealing with Dreamdery problems.
cobblemon.species.kertruffle.name: Kertruffle
cobblemon.species.kertruffle.desc: Needing little more than water and air to live, Kertruffle can adapt to hostile environments where few other Pokémon would survive.
cobblemon.species.mosshroom.name: Mosshroom
cobblemon.species.mosshroom.desc: Mosshroom is commonly mistaken for a grass hill. When something bumps into it, it releases spores before shuffling off to find a quiet place to sleep.
cobblemon.species.lumishroom.name: Lumishroom
cobblemon.species.lumishroom.desc: The light from a Lumishrooms caps can illuminate even the darkest caverns. Lumishroom use these lights to talk with one another from far away.
cobblemon.species.perishroom.name: Perishroom
cobblemon.species.perishroom.desc: Perishroom never seems to need to eat or drink in order to survive, and rarely moves. The spores it releases when attacked are fatal in even small doses.
cobblemon.species.rocano.name: Rocano
cobblemon.species.rocano.desc: Rocano is able to store up pressure inside its body by eating ore. When it is startled, it will release it all at once in a jet of magma to scare away foes.
cobblemon.species.volcaroc.name: Volcaroc
cobblemon.species.volcaroc.desc: Volcaroc live very deep in the earth and are a rare sight close to the surface. While digging, they leave long tubes behind them as if formed by magma.
cobblemon.species.volcoalder.name: Volcoalder
cobblemon.species.volcoalder.desc: Volcoalder claim entire hotspots as their personal domains. The strongest Volcoalder use mighty eruptions to protect their lands.
cobblemon.species.pounther.name: Pounther
cobblemon.species.pounther.desc: Pounther plays with its siblings by sneaking up on them and then jumping them when they least expect it. This game serves as training for the hunt.
cobblemon.species.jaguile.name: Jaguile
cobblemon.species.jaguile.desc: Jaguile are incredibly patient hunters. They use specialized appendages to detect changes in the wind, and pounce on their prey with blinding speed.
cobblemon.species.neureka.name: Neureka
cobblemon.species.neureka.desc: Neureka draws energy from active minds and creative thinking. When a nearby person has a novel idea, this social Pokemon begins to shine brightly.
cobblemon.species.cerebrulb.name: Cerebrulb
cobblemon.species.cerebrulb.desc: Cerebrulb's light stimulates brain cell activity to an extraordinary degree. This trait makes it a common companion for scientists and academics.
cobblemon.species.peppit.name: Peppit
cobblemon.species.peppit.desc: Peppit seeks out the spiciest berries to make its Fire attacks burn hotter. Groups of Peppit love to play in dry leaves, often causing small fires.
cobblemon.species.hoppanero.name: Hoppanero
cobblemon.species.hoppanero.desc: Hoppanero has few natural predators due to its spicy fur. When Hoppanero gather in large groups, they have been known to cause heat waves.
cobblemon.species.scovalope.name: Scovalope
cobblemon.species.scovalope.desc: Scovalope is highly adept at evading detection. The fruits on its horns may fall off, and are considered both a lucky charm and a delicacy.
cobblemon.species.pawter.name: Pawter
cobblemon.species.pawter.desc: A loyal companion and a skilled swimmer, Pawter is a common partner for sailors and lifeguards. It can detect storms and warn others before they arrive.
cobblemon.species.hurricanine.name: Hurricanine
cobblemon.species.hurricanine.desc: Hurricanine becomes more and more energetic shortly before a storm hits. When angry, its growls are so loud and harsh, they evoke the rumble of thunder.
cobblemon.species.skullarva.name: Skullarva
cobblemon.species.skullarva.desc: Skullarva spends its early life hidden away in damp caves and crevasses. It tries to scare away predators and trainers by mimicking the cries of stronger Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.maskoon.name: Maskoon
cobblemon.species.maskoon.desc: It imitates the cries of other Pokémon, but warps them so they sound morbid and unnatural. The pattern on its back is used to scare off predators.
cobblemon.species.mortasque.name: Mortasque
cobblemon.species.mortasque.desc: It can make human-like sounds to scare away predators and unnerve those that enter its domain. Many 'haunted' houses are merely nests for Mortasque.
cobblemon.species.vectol.name: Vectol
cobblemon.species.vectol.desc: Vectol was a computer virus that had infected the PC storage system. The process that converts data into matter has given it a physical form.
cobblemon.species.vectol2.name: Vectol2
cobblemon.species.vectol2.desc: Exposed to an unknown code, Vectol has upgraded to Vectol.2. It feeds by using its stinger to download data, leaving computers a corrupt mess afterwards.
