cobblemon.species.vanitom.desc: The spirit is now strong enough to exit the painting. By pretending to cry they haunt old mansions, and are often seen as a pest, leaving wet paint throughout expensive halls.
cobblemon.species.turtelisk.name: Turtelisk
cobblemon.species.turtelisk.desc: Its sturdy shell is made from iron and won't take a scratch from any attack. With its sharp beak, it can bite through the toughest tree trunks.
cobblemon.species.karaggon.name: Karaggon
cobblemon.species.karaggon.desc: With its powerful limbs it's developed upon evolving, it launches itself like a cannon ball at its foes. Very little can get past their sturdy shells.
cobblemon.species.akrovern.name: Akrovern
cobblemon.species.akrovern.desc: Akrovern are vicious and aggressive towards anyone in their way and are so hard to tame hardly any Trainer has one. Those able to control this powerful beast are often honored and respected for their achievement. During medieval times, Akrovern was known to be one of the most powerful Dragon-type Pokémon in the world, that could destroy an entire kingdom on its own when angered.
cobblemon.species.velosoil.name: Velosoil
cobblemon.species.velosoil.desc: Eating minerals from rock formations is part of their healthy diet. It can chew a tunnel all the way through earth's mantle due to it's tough, heat-resistant skin. The eggs they hatch from are hard like rocks.
cobblemon.species.rapterra.name: Rapterra
cobblemon.species.rapterra.desc: Quick on it's feet, Rapterra can bash into things to deal major damage. They eat twice as much as their previous evolution.
cobblemon.species.titanodon.name: Titanodon
cobblemon.species.titanodon.desc: Titanodon is a very destructive Pokémon. It can destroy big buildings with ease and is always up for a challenge against other strong Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.whelter.name: Whelter
cobblemon.species.whelter.desc: Instead of flippers, Whelter's fins are more similar to flotation devices, helping them stay afloat without expending energy. They move slowly, filtering water through their mouth to feed.
cobblemon.species.refhuge.name: Refhuge
cobblemon.species.refhuge.desc: The largest fish pokemon, Refhuge is incredibly docile and has gained a reputation for ferrying people and Pokémon across wide expanses of water. Its red gills can light up to illuminate their paths, creating strange underwater roads at night.
cobblemon.species.gammar.name: Gammar
cobblemon.species.gammar.desc: Because it is only small, it takes shelter in coral patches and rock formations. When cornered, it will release a jolt of electricity allowing make its escape. It is famed for having such bright colours, and is a sought after prize for many Trainers who participate in Pokémon Beauty Contests.
cobblemon.species.zaptang.name: Zaptang
cobblemon.species.zaptang.desc: A social species, it feels more comfortable with its comrades. A shoal of them will combine their powers to paralyse large predators like Tanchor.
cobblemon.species.mimish.name: Mimish
cobblemon.species.eelord.name: Eelord
cobblemon.species.eelord.desc: Rumors say Eelord's blood can cure every disease. It has been hunted all over the world for its blood, and now only a few remain.
cobblemon.species.aquaro.name: Aquaro
cobblemon.species.aquaro.desc: The spiky barbs on its body are toxic, which it can use to defend itself when singled out. They flash their bright colours to warn others of the danger.
cobblemon.species.aquarcher.name: Aquarcher
cobblemon.species.aquarcher.desc: It can stretch and tense up its body to shoot high speed water from its mouth. They gather in hundreds and have been known to also shoot Aquaro when threatened.
cobblemon.species.icee.name: Icee
cobblemon.species.icee.desc: These Pokémon live in such large groups, sometimes they can cover cave floors entirely. They grab passerby's legs and freeze their toes when happy.
cobblemon.species.fraxeel.name: Fraxeel
cobblemon.species.fraxeel.desc: Fraxeel burst out of holes in the middle of the snow, immobilizing their prey with shock. Its teeth are so cold they freeze their victim's blood instantly.
cobblemon.species.colosseel.name: Colosseel
cobblemon.species.colosseel.desc: This Pokémon becomes so big upon evolving that it cannot leave its cave. It lures prey and finishes them with jaws large enough to tear through the hull of a cargo ship.
cobblemon.species.snowoof.name: Snowoof
cobblemon.species.snowoof.desc: Because they are only found in northern areas, Snowoof like to play and run around all day to keep their body heat at a suitable temperature. Their markings typically discern alphas from betas.
cobblemon.species.blizzund.name: Blizzund
cobblemon.species.blizzund.desc: Blizzunds develop a shield the rest of their body from multiple dangers when evolved, and while it seems impractical to let the head be exposed, they have also evolved to have very tough skulls.
cobblemon.species.hoofrost.name: Hoofrost
cobblemon.species.hoofrost.desc: When snowstorms hit, these Pokémon can be seen gathering in big herds so they don't get lost. Its rock-hard ice hooves are durable enough to climb up rocky mountains.
cobblemon.species.glacyak.name: Glacyak
cobblemon.species.glacyak.desc: Glacyak were once used as transportation by people centuries ago. They mastered their skill of quickly climbing up even the most rockiest and steepest of mountains. They are usually very friendly but when angered to a degree, they will rampage and destroy everything in its way.
cobblemon.species.froska.name: Froska
cobblemon.species.froska.desc: Froska enjoy spending their time making small snowmen whenever they can, making each one have at least one thing unique to them. Whenever they make similar ones, they topple over the older ones instead.
cobblemon.species.mafreozee.name: Mafreozee
cobblemon.species.mafreozee.desc: Mafreozee can bend even the thickest ice with their mind, creating intricate and beautiful statues from them. They often accompany sculptors and love to express their thoughts through their art rather than their 'words'.
cobblemon.species.ragtoc.name: Ragtoc
cobblemon.species.ragtoc.desc: It rhythmically shifts from side to side. If its rhythm is somehow interrupted, it can no longer maintain its energy. | Speed is bad, but I'd say it has a base special attack of 100 with special defense of 120 as well as defense.
cobblemon.species.chronotoc.name: Chronotoc
cobblemon.species.chronotoc.desc: Chronotol is said to be timeless, and its aura seems to affect its environment. Its concept of time is beyond human understanding.
cobblemon.species.herokolus.name: Herokolus
cobblemon.species.herokolus.desc: Herokolus train everyday so they can throw at their targets accurately. Its headpiece has special properties that help it to concentrate.
cobblemon.species.diskobolus.name: Diskobolus
cobblemon.species.diskobolus.desc: To improve its disc throwing skills, it carries a larger disc as it grows.
cobblemon.species.atolus.name: Atolus
cobblemon.species.atolus.desc: Everytime it wins a battle, it carries a larger rock. It is said that an Atolus once pushed a mountain to save a village.
cobblemon.species.sauntler.name: Sauntler
cobblemon.species.sauntler.desc: Sauntler are grave dwellers. They wander around cemeteries, visiting each grave to have a connection with lost spirits.
cobblemon.species.grevetiery.name: Grevetiery
cobblemon.species.grevetiery.desc: Grevetiery carried the task of gathering the lost dark spirits at graveyards and bringing them to the underworld.
cobblemon.species.necrogeist.name: Necrogeist
cobblemon.species.necrogeist.desc: Imbued with the souls of vengeful spirits, this Pokémon hunts down anyone who has ever attacked it before. It is said to be a servant to the Ruler of the Underworld.
cobblemon.species.shimm.name: Shimm
cobblemon.species.shimm.desc: Believed to be a magic box that was brought to life by a magician, pulling out the dagger from it will kill it.
cobblemon.species.zhimm.name: Zhimm
cobblemon.species.zhimm.desc: It has the ability to transfer magic between it's two bodies, which both have minds of their own. Zhimms love to do tricks on both young and old, but their blades have proven to be a bit dangerous.
cobblemon.species.shalazhimm.name: Shalazhimm
cobblemon.species.shalazhimm.desc: Shalazhimm are typically seen at any places emanating magic, as it feeds off of it. They're also typically found terrorizing magic shows, as they're upset by false acts of magician-ry.
cobblemon.species.fumystic.name: Fumystic
cobblemon.species.fumystic.desc: Born from a mystical fire, these Pokémon can be spotted roaming abandoned sites that possess enigmatic energy. They are regarded as lucky Pokémon since they will guide and protect lost travelers on their journey.
cobblemon.species.fumeseous.name: Fumeseous
cobblemon.species.fumeseous.desc: In ancient times, it is said that a person will be granted eternal protection if partnered with a Fumeseous. It can control fire fumes at will to do its every bidding.
cobblemon.species.dwarpy.name: Dwarpy
cobblemon.species.dwarpy.desc: Lucky are those who can grasp the golden tip of a Dwarpy's tail. They gather near places where treasure is found.
cobblemon.species.bonafant.name: Bonafant
cobblemon.species.bonafant.desc: The bell at the tip of its tail makes an eerie, primal sound that aids focus. Because of this, they are kept in places of peace and meditation.
cobblemon.species.wisdaum.name: Wisdaum
cobblemon.species.wisdaum.desc: It lives in seclusion, defending its tail with its four large arms. It is said that the sound of its tail is the sound of enlightenment itself.
cobblemon.species.vimana.name: Vimana
cobblemon.species.vimana.desc: Vimana love to fly over people who're in love. They gather together to sing happy tunes, which can calm even the most restless soul.
cobblemon.species.vimanzia.name: Vimanzia
cobblemon.species.vimanzia.desc: This Pokémon's appearance causes joy for everyone looking at it. Because of that, the pheromones Vimanzia pours out are known to help cure depression.
cobblemon.species.pichip.name: Pichip
cobblemon.species.pichip.desc: Every Pichip claims a boulder as its territory and will defend it to the death. Pichip alerts intruders with a loud bark.
cobblemon.species.shifuu.name: Shifuu
cobblemon.species.shifuu.desc: - Counter Fighting - Mirror Coat Psychic - Tackle Normal 9 Safeguard Normal 13 Smack DownSTAB Rock 19 Noble Roar Normal 21 Ancient PowerSTAB Rock 25 Take Down Normal 29 Stealth Rock Rock 34 Rock SlideSTAB Rock 39 Wide Guard Rock 43 Retaliate Normal 48 Body Slam Normal 54 Stone EdgeSTAB Rock 60 Outrage Dragon 70 Rainbow Rush Fairy
cobblemon.species.yokeye.name: Yokeye
cobblemon.species.yokeye.desc: Yokeye are some of the most playful and mischievous Pokemon in Atlas. There's never not a moment where it's playing some kind of game or trick.
cobblemon.species.ghouch.name: Ghouch
cobblemon.species.ghouch.desc: Though it's appearance isn't much of a change, there's terrible things brewing underneath the fabric cocoon. It's eye can see through walls if it focuses.
cobblemon.species.spireye.name: Spireye
cobblemon.species.spireye.desc: Spireye are always pestering the spirits that try to depart from the world, making them upset and creating poltergeists. It's three eyes can see the real world, the dream world, and the spirit world.
cobblemon.species.polypus.name: Polypus
cobblemon.species.polypus.desc: Clusters of Polypus stay within the reef that they are born in. When the reef is in danger, they leave to find a new home wherever the ocean currents take them.
cobblemon.species.scubella.name: Scubella
cobblemon.species.scubella.desc: Once evolved from Polypus, Scubella lift from the ocean surface and let the winds take them wherever it blows. They are also known to fall in the hands of strangers they are attracted to unexpectedly on their journeys.
cobblemon.species.galaguana.name: Galaguana
cobblemon.species.galaguana.desc: Galaguana reside on the soft, sandy shores of a single small island. They swim out into calm waters to relax and eat seaweed. They constantly lick their lips to keep them moist, which has resulted in some companies using their saliva in lip stick.
cobblemon.species.reparine.name: Reparine
cobblemon.species.reparine.desc: The barnacles that cover Reparine's body are able to fire hypersaline water. Reparine make their homes on jagged, rocky shorelines, and being able to swim in even the roughest of seas, they seem to be the only Pokemon able to withstand the constant battering of crushing waves.
cobblemon.species.orbranch.name: Orbranch
cobblemon.species.orbranch.desc: They hide among trees, leaving only their lantern-like appendage to be seen, and proceed to guide unsuspecting travelers into treacherous forests and swamps.
cobblemon.species.petrifern.name: Petrifern
cobblemon.species.petrifern.desc: Petrifern is known to have lived at the bottom of the worlds most ancient forests. Its convenient roots allowed it to constantly move in search of sunlight.
cobblemon.species.serrarbo.name: Serrarbo
cobblemon.species.serrarbo.desc: Older Serrarbo have sharper leaves and harder bark. They have been known to survive intense forest fires.
cobblemon.species.juraseed.name: Juraseed
cobblemon.species.juraseed.desc: Juraseed are considered living fossils. Though uncommon today, they used to cover the entire earth and can live up to 1,000 years. Scientists estimate they may contain memories of over 500 previous Trainers.
cobblemon.species.carnaceous.name: Carnaceous
cobblemon.species.carnaceous.desc: Carnaceous root themselves, hiding their faces behind their foliage, before ambushing their prey. They can lie sleeping for months before being accidentally awakened by unwary explorers.
cobblemon.species.lizmoke.name: Lizmoke
cobblemon.species.charnosaur.name: Charnosaur
cobblemon.species.charnosaur.desc: Charnosaur's smoke is as hot as fire itself. It can spew red hot magma from it's maw to defend itself.
cobblemon.species.tinguano.name: Tinguano
cobblemon.species.tinguano.desc: Although clumsy, their hardened fists and thumb spikes allow them to fight off predators larger than them. Tinguano lived 125 million years ago, and was revived by modern science.
cobblemon.species.donguano.name: Donguano
cobblemon.species.donguano.desc: A Pokémon that first lived 125 million years ago, Donguano strive to be the best in one-on-one combat, usually challenging stronger Donguano both inside and outside their social circles.
cobblemon.species.carnibble.name: Carnibble
cobblemon.species.carnosteus.name: Carnosteus
cobblemon.species.carnosteus.desc: Carnosteus's ferocious and devilish appearance is masked by an even more horrific exoskeleton that not only terrifies small prey, but acts as a powerful barrier when trading blows with other mighty predators.
cobblemon.species.dilophang.name: Dilophang
cobblemon.species.dilophright.name: Dilophright
cobblemon.species.dilophright.desc: Dilophright are vicious, cornering their prey and then spraying them with strong acid that has the power to melt flesh. Although brave and downright brutal in one-on-one confrontations, they are known to retreat as soon as they're outnumbered.
cobblemon.species.mampth.name: Mampth
cobblemon.species.mampth.desc: Mampth fossils were discovered on the mountain tops of Vahno. Their fur keeps them warm even in -50Â° weather. Mampth's flappy ears are used to blow harsh cold gales at their opponents.
cobblemon.species.mammolaya.name: Mammolaya
cobblemon.species.mammolaya.desc: Mammolaya use their tusks to charge into rivals and foes during disputes. They ruled the land during the Ice Age, with full grown Maulethal as their only threats. When viewed from a distance, Mammolaya look like snow covered mountains, giving them the name 'Walking Glaciers'.
cobblemon.species.mesoth.name: Mesoth
cobblemon.species.megatherice.name: Megatherice
cobblemon.species.megatherice.desc: Megatherice thrive in cold climates, usually prowling only during the night for it's prey. It's coat manages to keep it warm, and also give it proper camouflage. It still retains it's laziness from it's unevolved from.
cobblemon.species.paow.name: Paow
cobblemon.species.paow.desc: A Chinese princess once brought down an entire army with just a single Paow. They are found high up on mountains, blowing out ash and smoke from their gaping mouths.
cobblemon.species.ganpaow.name: Ganpaow
cobblemon.species.ganpaow.desc: Evolution gives Ganpaow an explosive personality. The draconic energy that was dormant bursts open its old shell, but it is still unable to manifest completely.
cobblemon.species.yanpaow.name: Yanpaow
cobblemon.species.yanpaow.desc: Rarely seen, Yanpaow are attracted to celebrations and festivals all over the world. New colour variations are always being discovered.
cobblemon.species.beaniscule.name: Beaniscule
cobblemon.species.beaniscule.desc: Beaniscule are very easy to frighten due to their small size. They're rumored to be delicious, but no one knows due to them being protected by the Atlas government, as they're an endangered species.
cobblemon.species.beanormous.name: Beanormous
cobblemon.species.beanormous.desc: Beanormous are typically absent minded, having their heads figuratively and literally in the clouds. Despite their size, they're tremendously easy to scare.
cobblemon.species.visclaw.name: Visclaw
cobblemon.species.visclaw.desc: Visclaw stand next to one another when defending their home, acting as a sort of border to let other Pokemon know that they aren't welcome. If a Pokemon slips past them, they'll face the wrath of Visclaw's evolution...
cobblemon.species.edifierce.name: Edifierce
cobblemon.species.edifierce.desc: Edifierce thrives in quiet ruins, despite hardly moving. This can be attributed to it not needing to consume food to survive. Its walls are sculpted from ultra-hard mud. It defends the remains of a long-gone kingdom.
cobblemon.species.aurorelk.name: Aurorelk
cobblemon.species.phanfrica.name: Phanfrica
cobblemon.species.penguinsula.name: Penguinsula
cobblemon.species.phanta.name: Phanta
cobblemon.species.lepiterros.name: Lepiterros
cobblemon.species.lepiterros.desc: This Pokémon appears in legends, where its wings were said to contain the secrets of the world. Its said it would share this knowledge with those who sought it out with kind and pure intent.
cobblemon.species.orotolas.name: Orotolas
cobblemon.species.orotolas.desc: This Pokémon appears in legends, where it's said to have ripped the wings from another legendary Pokémon. It sleeps in a pile of gold, in a mountain deep within the Atlas Region.
cobblemon.species.devilicious.name: Devilicious
cobblemon.species.devilicious.desc: Devilicious spends its days sleeping, hiding out among plush toys in children's rooms. At night, it awakens and the fun begins.
